author: mmusich
body:
resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/39229

#### PR description:

Follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37384#issuecomment-1095361635.

#### PR validation:

To be tested in this PR, according to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/39229#issue-1354045720 it passes integration tests.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

title: get rid of more undefined behaviour in `TrackListMerger`
